title: Is it a good idea to post my book online? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes for many reasons… It helps you to build instant credibilityIt helps you to get more fans or followers from readers who are impacted by your bookIt helps you get possible offers and collaborators who needs your expertiseIt helps you to get feedback so your next version of book will be better and by then, you will already have a fan base who wants to buy your second book since they have read your first…and much more…
